The  1st  Respondent  also  asserts  that  the  said  Lots  form  a  part  of  the  reclaimed
portion of the Negombo Lagoon on the same basis that in the above-mentioned land
action No.5291/L before the District Court Negombo. Although the 1st Respondent
was  not  a  party  to  the  above-mentioned  partition  action  bearing  No.1870/P,  the
tenement list of Preliminary Plan 1271 provides that Lot 9 of the corpus forms a part
of the Negombo Lagoon. Accordingly, the 1st Respondent claims that he has acted
reasonably and rationally in arriving at a conclusion that the subject matter of the
